tool_description: Provides geo location and information about countries and cities
name: Countries Cities
title: Countries Cities

api_list.name: Cities in the Country
api_list.description: Returns the list of cities for the specified population. Maximum 1000 cities per page and the default population is greater than 15000

optional_parameters.name: population
optional_parameters.description: The minimal population of the city

api_list.name: Country GeoJson
Countries List
api_list.description: Returns the list of all countries with country codes

api_list.name: City Details
api_list.description: Returns a detailed information about the city and it's location

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.description: Returns capital, location, timezone, population, currency, languages, phone code of the country

api_list.name: Cities Nearby
api_list.description: list of the cities next to the location
